articles.description: Coronavirus vaccines may become obsolete in less than a year, a new poll conducted among leading epidemiologists suggests. The sloppy vaccination rollouts that have riddled many countries make this scenario even more likely.
articles.content:
A new survey conducted by the People’s Vaccine Alliance (PVA) among 77 epidemiologists from 28 countries around the world has yielded pessimistic results.
Around 66% of those surveyed – including ep… [+1761 chars]

articles.author: Kirti Pandey
articles.title: Explainer: Why scientists are saying 'Do this or else current COVID vaccines will be useless within a year' - Times Now
articles.description: UNAIDS says that since the start of 2021, high-income countries have on average vaccinated citizens at a rate of one dose per second while some poorer nations are yet to administer a single dose
articles.content:
• If mankind hoped to see the end of the COVID-19 pandemic with the arrival of vaccines, it must think again.

articles.title: Mutations could render current Covid vaccines ineffective in a year or less, epidemiologists warn - CNBC
articles.description: Mutations of the coronavirus could render current vaccines ineffective within a year, according to a survey of experts.
articles.content:
Bethany Smith administers a COVID-19 vaccination to a member of the public at a mass vaccination hub for the Aneurin Bevan Health Trust on March 14, 2021 in Newbridge, Wales.
